channel.description: Recent content in CTF on CyberJagadeesh

item.title: New York Flankees | THM Writeup
item.description: Introduction Detailed walkthroughs and solutions for New York Flankees CTF challenges on TryHackMe . Tools Used rustscan, burpsuite Enumeration Lets start the process by mapping host-name to target IP address. sudo echo "10.10.140.44 nythm.com" >> /etc/hosts Let’s start enumaration process using rustscan portscanner. rustscan -a nythm.com -- -sC -sV .----. .-. .-. .----..---. .----. .---. .--. .-. .-. | {} }| { } |{ {__ {_ _}{ {__ / ___} / {} \ | `| | | .

item.title: CyberLens CTF |THM Writeup
item.description: Introduction Detailed walkthroughs and solutions for CyberLens CTF challenges on TryHackMe . Tools Used rustscan, ping, burpsuite, nc, metasploit, msfvenom. Enumeration Lets start the process by mapping host-name to target IP address. mapping cyberlens.thm to the target IP address When any user or application on the system tries to access cyberlens.thm, it will be directed to the IP address specified in the /etc/hosts file. Lets use rustscan for port scanning the target domain.
